sense.def:
Predmet, ki je
spare
, je iste vrste kot tisti, ki jih uporabljamo, le da tega še ne potrebujemo.

seg.quote: Keep a spare fuse handy by the fuse box.

sense.def:
A spare
je dodaten predmet iste vrste kot tisti, ki jih uporabljamo, le da tega še ne potrebujemo.

seg.quote: There are some spares at the back if anyone wants more.

sense.def:
Kadar je predmet
spare
, ga trenutno nihče ne uporablja, zato ga lahko uporabimo mi.

seg.quote: We found a spare parking meter.

sense.def:
To spare something for a particular purpose
pomeni nameniti nekaj za poseben namen.

cit.quote: dati na stran, prihraniti, vzeti si

seg.quote: I got to my feet, thanking him for sparing time to see me.
More land is needed to grow food and less can be spared to graze cattle.

sense.def:
Kadar človek ali kraj
is spared
, ne utrpi hudih posledic nekega dogajanja.

seg.quote: The great cities of the Rhineland had not been spared.

sense.def:
To spare someone an unpleasant experience
pomeni preprečiti, da bi se nekomu zgodilo nekaj neprijetnega.

seg.quote: At least I am spared the shame of the children knowing.

sense.def:
To have time or money to spare
pomeni imeti nekaj časa ali denarja, ki ga trenutno ne potrebujemo za nič konkretnega.

seg.quote: He often had money to spare nowadays.
She caught her plane with a few minutes to spare.

sense.def:
To spare no expense in doing something
pomeni narediti nekaj na najboljši možen način, ne da bi poskušali varčevati.

seg.quote: The Agency has spared no expense with the system for storage.
